name: cohorting-datamart-engine
description: HAPI FHIR with cohorting and datamart engine features

scripts.docker-build:dev: docker build --build-arg PRODUCT=cohorting-datamart-engines --build-arg VERSION=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) -t docker.registry.fyrstain.com/cal/cohorting-datamart-engines:$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) -t docker.registry.fyrstain.com/cal/cohorting-datamart-engines:latest .
scripts.docker-build:release: docker build --build-arg PRODUCT=cohorting-datamart-engines --build-arg VERSION=$(git describe --tags --exact-match 2>/dev/null || git rev-parse --short HEAD) -t docker.registry.fyrstain.com/cal/cohorting-datamart-engines:$(git describe --tags --exact-match 2>/dev/null || git rev-parse --short HEAD) .
scripts.docker-push:release: docker push docker.registry.fyrstain.com/cal/cohorting-datamart-engines:$(git describe --tags --exact-match 2>/dev/null || git rev-parse --short HEAD)
scripts.release: npm run docker-build:release && npm run docker-push:release

author: Omar Guendouz <omar.guendouz@fyrstain.com>
